item.title: 卖美国 "变成了 "买美国
item.description:
在最新一期的万亿节目中，我们将讨论由特朗普引发的投资者对股市的抨击，以及这一切意味着什么。【原文：

On the latest episode of Trillions, we talk about the Trump-induced investor whipsaw in stock markets and what it all means.

】

item.title: Builder.ai 在债权人查封账户后申请破产
item.description: 在债权人扣押了这家英国初创公司银行账户中的大部分现金后，Builder.ai 在美国申请破产。【原文：Builder.ai filed for bankruptcy in the US after creditors seized most of the cash in the British startup’s bank accounts.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势下特朗普与习近平通话的报道引发美股飙升
item.description: 据报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与中国国家主席习近平通了电话，美股因此大涨，抹去了早些时候因失业救济人数意外跳升而造成的跌幅。【原文：US stocks jumped on reports of a phone call between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping, erasing earlier losses driven by unexpected jump in jobless claims.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会对加密货币的困惑加深，新一代 ETF 测试边界
item.description: 就在特朗普政府放松对数字资产的监管之际，一系列追逐收益率的新型加密货币基金正迫使美国证券交易委员会正视其监管框架中尚未解决的漏洞。【原文：A new line of yield-chasing crypto funds is forcing the Securities and Exchange Commission to confront unresolved gaps in its regulatory framework, just as the Trump administration eases oversight of digital assets.】

item.title: 吉姆-查诺斯认为赛勒的战略是个大空头，但其他人并不确定
item.description: 买入比特币，做空迈克尔-赛勒的策略。这是传奇空头卖家吉姆-查诺斯（Jim Chanos）的最新呼吁，他认为这种套利行为毫无疑问。其他人则不这么认为。【原文：Buy Bitcoin, short Michael Saylor’s Strategy. That’s the latest call from legendary short-seller Jim Chanos, who sees the arbitrage play as a no-brainer. Others aren’t so sure.】

item.title: 新世界房价创港岛豪宅项目新低
item.description: 新世界发展有限公司（New World Development Co.【原文：New World Development Co. launched a luxury residential project on the south side of Hong Kong Island at a record low price as the embattled developer aims to accelerate property sales amid debt concerns.】

item.title: 在世界经济论坛的猜测之后，拉加德决心完成欧洲央行任期
item.description: 在外界猜测克里斯蒂娜-拉加德将提前离任，前往瑞士领导世界经济论坛之后，她承诺将完成在欧洲中央银行的主席任期。【原文：Christine Lagarde pledged to see out her presidency at the European Central Bank following speculation over an early departure to lead the World Economic Forum in Switzerland.】

item.title: 比亚迪增长五倍后，中国汽车制造商在英国的份额接近 10
item.description: 随着比亚迪电动车型需求的持续增长，中国汽车制造商上个月加大了进军英国市场的力度，市场份额首次逼近 10%。【原文：Chinese automakers stepped up their push into the UK last month, closing in on a 10% market share for the first time as demand for BYD Co. electric models continues to boom.】

item.title: 财富管理公司 Cresset 利用私人信贷应对市场波动
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普断断续续的关税政策引发整个金融市场动荡之际，财富管理公司 Cresset Capital 转而利用私人信贷来提高客户回报。【原文：Wealth management firm Cresset Capital has turned to private credit to boost client returns as President Donald Trump’s on-off tariffs policy stokes turbulence across financial markets.】

item.title: 商业地产交易出现复苏迹象
item.description: 美国商业地产交易和融资在经历了唐纳德-特朗普总统 4 月初宣布加征关税的低迷后开始回暖。【原文：Commercial-property dealmaking and financing in the US is starting to pick up after a lull caused by President Donald Trump’s tariff announcements in early April.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平通电话，贸易和技术争端激化两国关系
item.description: 据中国国家媒体报道，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平周四发表了讲话。【原文：US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping spoke Thursday, according to Chinese state media, amid trade tensions that have roiled relations between the world’s two largest economies.】

item.title: 伦敦在激烈的上市竞争中面临更多挫折
item.description: 最近几周，伦敦振兴萎缩股市的努力遭遇了一系列挫折，一些公司将上市和首次公开募股（IPO）计划从市场上撤出。【原文：London’s bid to revive its shrinking stock market has faced a series of setbacks in recent weeks, with companies shifting listings and IPO plans from the market.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚大学学生贷款受到特朗普 "秘密武器 "的威胁
item.description: 特朗普政府升级了对美国顶尖大学的打击，将矛头指向哥伦比亚大学获得联邦助学贷款的机会—；这是白宫对学术界和关键资金流行使权力的一个新策略。【原文：The Trump administration escalated its fight against top American colleges by targeting Columbia University’s access to federal student loans — a new tactic in the White House’s drive to wield power over academia and key financial streams.】

item.title: 进口骤降，美国贸易赤字创历史最大收窄幅度
item.description: 美国 4 月份贸易赤字收窄幅度创下历史之最，进口额创下历史最大降幅，这表明一些公司在提高关税前大量预购商品的做法已戛然而止。【原文：The US trade deficit narrowed in April by the most on record on the largest-ever plunge in imports, illustrating an abrupt end to the massive front-loading of goods by some companies ahead of higher tariffs.】

item.title: 美国首次申请失业救济人数升至 10 月以来最高水平
item.description: 上周，美国失业救济金申请人数意外升至 10 月份以来的最高点，这加剧了就业市场正在降温的迹象。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits unexpectedly rose last week to the highest since October, adding to signs that the job market is cooling.】

item.title: 加拿大贸易赤字创历史新高，美国关税重创出口
item.description: 除大流行病外，加拿大出口创下近 17 年来的最大跌幅，商品贸易逆差扩大，创下历史之最。【原文：Canadian exports plunged by the most in nearly 17 years outside of the pandemic, widening the country’s merchandise trade deficit to the largest on record.】

item.title: 欧洲央行再次降息帮助经济抵御关税压力
item.description: 在通胀率跌破 2% 和经济屡遭美国关税打击之后，欧洲央行一年内第八次降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank lowered interest rates for the eighth time in a year after inflation dipped beneath 2% and the economy suffered repeated blows from US tariffs.】

item.title: 约翰逊称将努力在特朗普法案中保留 40,000 美元的盐税上限
item.description: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）表示，他正在努力争取在目前已提交参议院的税收法案草案中维持州和地方扣除额 4 万美元的新上限，因为共和党人正在参议院寻求制定一项较宽松的减免政策。【原文：House Speaker Mike Johnson said he is fighting to maintain the new $40,000 cap on state and local deductions in the draft tax bill now before the Senate, where Republicans are seeking to enact a less generous break.】

item.title: 布宜诺斯艾利斯债务攀升，米莱面临地方选举考验
item.description: 投资者正在抢购阿根廷最大省份的债务，因为他们押注哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政党将在不到三个月后的另一次地方选举中延续连胜势头。【原文：Investors are snapping up debt from Argentina’s largest province on bets that President Javier Milei’s political party will extend its winning streak in another local election in less than three months.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 创始人称私募股权投资已迷失方向
item.description: 收购巨头 Thoma Bravo 的联合创始人兼执行合伙人 Orlando Bravo 认为，私募股权投资在过去三年中迷失了方向，其领导者过于关注宏观经济，而不是公司的基本面。【原文：Private equity has lost its way in the last three years with its leaders becoming too concerned about macroeconomics instead of looking at the fundamentals of companies, according to Orlando Bravo, co-founder and managing partner of buyout giant Thoma Bravo.】

item.title: OnePlus 希望以 700 美元的新平板电脑压倒苹果和三星
item.description:
OnePlus的Pad系列已经发展到了三代，但它仍在努力在少数几家厂商主导的市场中脱颖而出。【原文：

Three generations into its Pad lineup, OnePlus is still trying to stand out in a market dominated by a few players.

】

item.title: 微软首席执行官称 OpenAI 联盟正在发生变化，但依然强大
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp.微软公司首席执行官萨蒂亚-纳德拉（Satya Nadella）表示，公司与OpenAI的重要合作关系正在发生变化，但依然保持着强劲的势头。【原文：Microsoft Corp. Chief Executive Officer Satya Nadella said his company’s crucial partnership with OpenAI is changing, but remains strong.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金建立流动性工具，对债券交易商进行排名
item.description: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元的主权财富基金正在开发对其债券交易商进行排名的工具，以便在全球固定收益市场上寻找最佳流动性。【原文：Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund is building tools to rank its bond dealers as it seeks out the best liquidity across global fixed-income markets.】

item.title: 二叠纪盆地页岩钻探者正视产量峰值前景
item.description:
一项关键数据的发布可能会凸显美国石油行业如何抑制产量增长以应对价格下跌。【原文：

A key data release may underline how the US oil industry is reining in production growth in response to lower prices.

】

item.title: 美国人避免搬家，房屋改建债券销售激增
item.description: 华尔街正在启动债券机器，因为美国的房主们发现，自 2022 年抵押贷款利率开始攀升以来，购买新房已变得遥不可及，他们转而申请房屋净值贷款，并对现有房产进行翻新。【原文：Wall Street is cranking up the bond machine as US homeowners — finding that buying a new house is out of reach since mortgage rates started climbing in 2022 – are instead getting home equity loans and sprucing up their current properties.】

item.title: 特朗普的预算提案对统计机构经费大打折扣
item.description: 我是纽约的美国经济编辑莫莉-史密斯。今天我们关注统计机构的预算削减。请将反馈意见和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，可以在这里注册。【原文：I’m Molly Smith, a US economy editor in New York. Today we’re looking at budget cuts at statistical agencies. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Vista 首席执行官称人工智能将迫使 60% 的超级返乡人群寻找工作
item.description: Vista Equity Partners 首席执行官罗伯特-史密斯（Robert F. Smith）表示，他预计人工智能将对私人市场行业的就业产生地震般的影响。【原文：Vista Equity Partners’ Chief Executive Officer Robert F. Smith said he expects AI to have a seismic impact on jobs in the private market industry.】

item.title: 图斯克联盟在波兰大选失败后收拢队伍
item.description: 波兰执政联盟试图翻过因其候选人在总统选举中落败而引发的危机这一页，誓言在议会任期过半时重振亲欧盟联盟。【原文：Poland’s ruling coalition sought to turn the page on the crisis sparked by the defeat of its candidate in presidential elections, vowing to rejuvenate the pro-European Union alliance halfway through the parliamentary term.】

item.title: 元的 "爱国主义 "推动了向军事技术的转变
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道 Meta 首席技术官安德鲁-博斯沃思（Andrew Bosworth）在彭博技术峰会上关于公司决定从事国防科技工作的评论。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner reports on Meta Chief Technology Officer Andrew Bosworth’s comments at the Bloomberg Technology Summit about the company’s decision to work on defense tech.】

item.title: 贸易战扩大，德国钢铁之城承受额外痛苦
item.description: 20 世纪 80 年代末，卡斯滕-沃格特（Karsten Vogt）没有听从父亲的劝告，违背家族传统。他还是进入了德国的钢铁行业，接手了曾祖父在两次大战之间创办的企业。【原文：Karsten Vogt didn’t listen to his dad telling him in the late 1980s to flout family tradition. He went into Germany’s steel industry all the same to take over the business his great-grandfather founded between the wars.】
